func.title: CanInsertMaterial

param.name: material_index
param.desc: Material to test to be inserted (see Material()).

param.name: out_insertpos
param.desc: If a writeable proplist is passed, members x and y are filled with the position at which the material would be inserted.

func.desc: Tests if a material pixel at the given position can be inserted.
func.remark: If the target position already contains material of the same density as the inserted material, the engine will search upwards for a proper insertion position.
